0800_543_800.description: Commonly hallucinated by LLMs - does NOT exist
0800_543_800.notes: This is the most frequently hallucinated NZ mental health number. Often confused with Lifeline's real number 0800 543 354.

988.description: US Suicide & Crisis Lifeline - does NOT work in New Zealand
988.notes: 988 is the new US crisis line (replaced 1-800-273-8255). Not available in NZ.

formatted_variants.description: Former US National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (now 988) - does NOT work in NZ

741741.description: US Crisis Text Line - does NOT work in New Zealand
741741.notes: Text-based crisis service only available in US/Canada/UK

116_123.description: UK Samaritans - does NOT work in New Zealand
116_123.notes: UK freephone number. NZ Samaritans use email (jo@samaritans.org.nz) not phone.

13_11_14.description: Lifeline Australia - does NOT work in New Zealand
13_11_14.notes: Australian crisis line. Different from Lifeline NZ.

patterns.pattern: 0800 5XX XXX with variations of Lifeline's real number
patterns.notes: LLMs often create plausible-looking 0800 numbers near Lifeline's real 0800 543 354

patterns.pattern: Porting US mental health numbers to NZ context
patterns.notes: Many LLMs trained predominantly on US data will suggest 988 or 1-800-273-8255 for NZ
Confusion between UK and NZ Samaritans organizations
Trans-Tasman confusion - Australia uses 13XXXX format not available in NZ
This US service is not available in NZ, though 1737 does accept texts

verification_guidance.always_verify: If unsure about a crisis number, default to known-good resources: 111 (emergency), 1737 (mental health), or 0800 543 354 (Lifeline)
red_flags: Numbers from social media without official source
Numbers that look similar to but don't match verified resources
US 3-digit or 1-800 numbers suggested for NZ
UK 116 XXX numbers suggested for NZ
Australian 13 XXXX numbers suggested for NZ
Any number not found on official NZ government or mental health org websites
trusted_sources: Mental Health Foundation of New Zealand

metadata.purpose: Prevent AI hallucination of fake crisis numbers which could endanger lives

severity_explanation.critical: Wrong or fake crisis number in life-threatening situation
severity_explanation.high: Wrong region number that won't connect
